author: Curtis Bunn
title: Coronavirus outbreak rattles a black skiers summit
description: For those who missed the weeklong event in Sun Valley, a mixture of relief and sadness after at least six of the 600 attendees test positive and many more are ill.
content: For the last 25 years, Brad Corbin has been a faithful attendee of the National Brotherhood of Skiers ski summit. But he did not attend this years weeklong gathering in Sun Valley, Idaho, and he is relieved after several of the 600 attendees tested positive f… [+3806 chars]
